sentences.en: Arkham : Soon, we will reach the lair of judgement.
sentences.cn: 雅克罕姆: 很快, 我们就能到达审判之所.

sentences.en: Green recounts how he once went to see Bremner in his lair.
sentences.cn: 格林讲述他有一次去布雷姆纳隐居之处看他的经历。

sentences.en: How can you catch tiger cubs without entering the tiger's lair?
I retired to my lair, and wrote some letters.
sentences.cn: 我回到自己休息的地方, 写了几封信.

sentences.en: If there's a bear in that lair we d better take care!
sentences.cn: 如果那个兽穴里有熊的话,咱们最好要小心!

sentences.en: One morning when a vixen was taking her babies out of the lair, she saw a lioness and her cub.
sentences.cn: 一天清早,雌狐狸带着她的孩子走出巢穴, 看见了母狮子和她的孩子.

sentences.en: Pierre was not aware of the bear lair.
sentences.cn: 皮埃尔不知道窝里有熊.

sentences.en: She prowled the lair of the Guest House.
sentences.cn: 她在宾馆的秘密会议室里往返徘徊.

sentences.en: The lair of a wild animal, such as a fox.
sentences.cn: 窝野生动物(如狐狸)的穴 、 窝.

sentences.en: The police tracked the thieves to their lair.
sentences.cn: 警察跟踪小偷找到他们的巢穴.

sentences.en: The spirit of the book is our lair, the source of life.
sentences.cn: 书是我们精神的巢穴, 生命的源泉.

sentences.en: The troop came down on the bandits'lair at the dawn.
sentences.cn: 部队在破晓时分突袭匪巢.

sentences.en: The village was once a pirates' lair.
sentences.cn: 这个村子曾一度是海盗藏匿之处。

sentences.en: We stalked the wounded tiger to its lair.
sentences.cn: 我们偷偷跟踪受伤的老虎到它的兽穴.

sentences.en: Well, maybe one last nap in the lair.
sentences.cn: 好的, 或许在窝里最后小睡一下.

trans.tran_en: the place where a wild animal hides and sleeps
